description: Properties from Common Information Model (CIM) schema (http://www.dmtf.org/standards/cim) that represent settings specifically related to an allocated resource that are outside the scope of the CIM class typically used to represent the resource itself. These properties may be specified to volume, host aggregate and flavor. For each property details, please refer to http://schemas.dmtf.org/wbem/cim-html/2/CIM_ResourceAllocationSettingData.html.

AddressOnParent.title: Address On Parent
AddressOnParent.description: Describes the address of this resource in the context of the Parent.

AllocationUnits.title: Allocation Units
AllocationUnits.description: This property specifies the units of allocation used by the Reservation and Limit properties.

AutomaticAllocation.title: Automatic Allocation
AutomaticAllocation.description: This property specifies if the resource will be automatically allocated.

AutomaticDeallocation.title: Automatic Deallocation
AutomaticDeallocation.description: This property specifies if the resource will be automatically de-allocated.

ConsumerVisibility.title: Consumer Visibility
ConsumerVisibility.description: Describes the consumers visibility to the allocated resource.

Limit.title: Limit
Limit.description: This property specifies the upper bound, or maximum amount of resource that will be granted for this allocation.

MappingBehavior.title: Mapping Behavior
MappingBehavior.description: Specifies how this resource maps to underlying resources. If the HostResource array contains any entries, this property reflects how the resource maps to those specific resources.

OtherResourceType.title: Other Resource Type
OtherResourceType.description: A string that describes the resource type when a well defined value is not available and ResourceType has the value 'Other'.

PoolID.title: Pool ID
PoolID.description: This property specifies which ResourcePool the resource is currently allocated from, or which ResourcePool the resource will be allocated from when the allocation occurs.

Reservation.title: Reservation
Reservation.description: This property specifies the amount of resource guaranteed to be available for this allocation.

ResourceSubType.title: Resource Sub Type
ResourceSubType.description: A string describing an implementation specific sub-type for this resource.

ResourceType.title: Resource Type
ResourceType.description: The type of resource this allocation setting represents.

VirtualQuantity.title: Virtual Quantity
VirtualQuantity.description: This property specifies the quantity of resources presented to the consumer.

VirtualQuantityUnits.title: Virtual Quantity Units
VirtualQuantityUnits.description: This property specifies the units used by the VirtualQuantity property.

Weight.title: Weight
Weight.description: This property specifies a relative priority for this allocation in relation to other allocations from the same ResourcePool.

Connection.title: Connection
Connection.description: The thing to which this resource is connected.

HostResource.title: Host Resource
HostResource.description: This property exposes specific assignment of resources.
